text: The Nigeria national under-20 football team represents Nigeria in international football completions. They have attended the FIFA U-20 World Cup 12 times with its best placing as runners-up twice in 1989 and 2005. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-20 World Cup record=== ** 1983 - Group stage ** 1985 - Third place ** 1987 - Group stage ** 1989 - Runners-up ** 1999 - Quarter-finals ** 2005 - Runners-up ** 2007 - Quarter-finals ** 2009 - Round of 16 ** 2011 - Quarter-finals ** 2013 - Round of 16 ** 2015 - Round of 16 ** 2019 - Round of 16 ** 2023 - Quarter-finals ===Africa U-20 Cup of Nations record=== Africa U-20 Cup of Nations Africa U-20 Cup of Nations Africa U-20 Cup of Nations Africa U-20
